Package com.cofii2.myAClasses

Class MLayout

java.lang.Object
com.cofii2.myAClasses.MLayout
public class MLayout
extends java.lang.Object
Class containing custom methods that aligns component using only GroupLayout (for now)
Author:
C0FII

    • MLayout

      public MLayout​(java.awt.LayoutManager ly, int limit)
      Construct default LayoutManager with limit rows
      Parameters:
      ly - LayoutManager to use (Only GroupLayout works for now)
      limit - How many rows of components

  • Method Details

    • fourAndOneSequence

      public void fourAndOneSequence​(javax.swing.JComponent[] C1, javax.swing.JComponent[] C2, javax.swing.JComponent[] C3, javax.swing.JComponent[] C4, javax.swing.JComponent[] C5)
      Customize GroupLayout; the first 4 component on the first row and the last one below the 2nd component
      Parameters:
      C1 - 1st column (Labels)
      C2 - 2nd column TextFields
      C3 - 2nd column bound to previous param
      C4 - 3nd column (Buttons)
      C5 - 4th column (List)

      public static javax.swing.JComponent[][] lineSequenceYClone​(javax.swing.GroupLayout gl, javax.swing.JComponent[] components, int rows)
      lineSequenceYClone copys the 1st array of component creating multiples rows
      Parameters:
      gl - GroupLayout needed for aligning
      components - row of components to copy
      rows - how many rows
      Returns:
      double array of components in result of the arrengment

    • lineSequenceYClone

      public static javax.swing.JComponent[][] lineSequenceYClone​(javax.swing.GroupLayout gl, javax.swing.JLabel[] headers, javax.swing.JComponent[] components, int rows)
      lineSequenceYClone; 1st the headers and copys the giving components to 2nd and forth
      Parameters:
      gl - GroupLayout needed for aligning
      headers - JLabel for columns name
      components - row of components to copy
      rows - how many rows
      Returns:
      double array of components in result of the arrengment excluding headers
